Body: Try looking in a mirror into your mouth while producing some words like "fill feel hello ladle larry bottle etc". If you see a closure further back (by the dangling thing, your uvula), it is a dark l, while if a closure just behind your teeth, it is a light l. You could even do this with a small pocket mirror in high light -- or a webcam maybe for best results, so you don't have to look at the display while producing the sounds.
